abstract: The starting shot for the auction for Satyam Computer Services will go off Monday, when bidding will open for a stake in the fraud-hit Indian company, Deepak Parekh, one of its government-appointed directors, told Dow Jones Newswires.
lead_paragraph: The starting shot for the auction for Satyam Computer Services will go off Monday, when bidding will open for a stake in the fraud-hit Indian company, Deepak Parekh, one of its government-appointed directors, told Dow Jones Newswires.
